We recommend that you access the “Prefer: Odporúčame ísť do sekcie "Preferencie", aby ste získali "Kľúč na obnovenie účtu" a bezpečne ho uložili. Tento kľúč bude nevyhnutný pre obnovenie prístupu k platforme a k vašim údajom v prípade, že svoje heslo zabudnete.
The number of activities recently detect:
The number of activities recently detected appears to be higher than usual.

This could be a sign of an attack (for example, someone flooding your server with bogus information) or just a usage spike due to an increased visibility of your project.

Examine the issue to determine whether it is legitimate or not.

The activities with unusual stats are:
{ActivityDump}
{FreeMemory} of {TotalMemory} available:
{FreeMemory} of {TotalMemory} available diskspace used.

The server cannot guarantee that a new report can be stored, so submissions have been disabled.

{FreeMemory} of {TotalMemory} available diskspace used.

Please consider asking your technical support to create more disk space on the server.

Dear {RecipientName},\\n\\nThis is a tes:
Dear {RecipientName},

This is a test email sent out from the platform's administrative interface.

Reception of this email indicates that the server was able to authenticate to and interact with the SMTP mail server.

Kind regards,
{NodeName}
Dear {RecipientName},\\n\\nThis is an em:
Dear {RecipientName},

This is an email to notify you that a request has been made to change your email address to {NewEmailAddress}.

Click the following link to validate this change:
{Url}

If you didn't request this change, change your password and contact your system administrator.

Kind regards,
{NodeName}
Expiration alert for HTTPS certificate: Upozornenie na uplynutie platnosti certifikátu HTTPS

Dear {RecipientName},\\n\\nThis is an em:
Dear {RecipientName},

This is an email to inform you that your PGP key is expiring or has already expired.

You should extend its validity and update the key present on the platform, or upload a new key.

{PGPKeyInfo}

Without a valid PGP key, the system won't be able to encrypt data provided to you.

Kind regards,
{NodeName}
Dear {RecipientName},\\n\\n{ExpiringSubm:
Dear {RecipientName},

{ExpiringSubmissionCount} reports are expiring and will be soon deleted.

The earliest expiration date is {EarliestExpirationDate}.

Please remember to check them before they are deleted.

{Url}

Kind regards,
{NodeName}
Dear {RecipientName},\\n\\nThis is an em:
Dear {RecipientName},

This is an email to notify you that a whistleblower has selected you as a valuable recipient of their report.

You are asked to pay special attention to the information and material contained therein. Please keep in mind that whistleblowers often expose themselves to high personal risks in the interest of the public. Therefore the material provided within this report should be considered to be of high importance.

The report can be accessed at:
{Url}

Kind regards,
{NodeName}

A thorough description of the submitted: A thorough description of the submitted evidence enhances our ability to evaluate claims and investigate. Please take care to reference significant portions of any videos, images or documents submitted.

You're receiving this email because a us: Tento e-mail ste dostali, pretože pre vás bol v systéme vytvorený užívateľský účet: {Site}
Please click on the activation link to p: Kliknite na aktivačný odkaz, aby ste pokračovali k aktivácii účtu a nastavili svoje užívateľské heslo.
After successful activation you will be: Po úspešnej aktivácii budete mať prístup do systému pomocou nasledujúceho odkazu: {LoginUrl}

To log in, visit:: Ak sa chcete prihlásiť, navštívte stránku:
The number of activities recently detect: Bol zaznamenaný vyšší počet aktivít ako je obvyklé.
This could be a sign of an attack (for e: Toto môže byť prejavom prebiehajúceho útoku (napríklad niekto zaplavuje Váš server falošnými informáciami) alebo môže ísť o obyčajný nárast popularity Vášho webu.
Examine the issue to determine whether i: Preskúmať problém a zistiť, či je oprávnený alebo nie.
The server cannot guarantee that a new r: Server nemohol zaručiť uloženie nového podania. Príjem ďalších podaní je preto zastavený.
Please consider asking your technical su: Prosím požiadajte vašu technickú podporu o rozšírenie dostupného priestoru na disku.
GlobaLeaks technology includes a server: Technológia GlobaLeaks zabezpečuje serverovú kontrolu stavu jednotlivých komponentov a upozorní Vás na prípadné situácie, ktoré vyžadujú Vašu zvýšenú pozornosť.
For more information, log in to the Admi: Pre viacej informácií sa prihláste do administrátorského rozhrania a pozrite si sekcie "Systémové štatistiky" a "Anomálie".
This is an email to inform you that the: Toto je emailové upozornenie, že platnosť PGP kľúča týchto používateľov vypršala alebo onedlho vyprší:
